jobActivity.title: initial history ...
jobActivity.body:
Hi Muhammet,
Thanks for the connection. I thought I would drop you a message to introduce myself and see if you would be open to career opportunities in the next 12 months? I work on both contract and permanent roles across the UK and look to connect with and speak to people like yourself.
Muhammet Atalay sent the following message at 10:51 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 10:51 AM Hello,
Thank you very much for your message I am looking for contract based opportunity. I will be available after 12 th July due to notice period.
If you have any contract base opportunity I will be happy to talk to you.
Please be informed that I will be in London Saturday for 13 days in order to finalize procedures in home office UK so we can arrange a meeting to talk further :) if you do not mind.
Finally, keep in touch for even urgent start position . I can consider to start 2 or 3 hours a day till 12 th July from Istanbul immediately than continue full after 12th July .
I can send my updated cv if you share your email address.
Regards,
Muhammet ATALAY...
Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 10:55 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 10:55 AM Hi Muhammet,
Thanks for your reply. I work a little different I like to prequalify all candidates before discussing roles with them, I currently don't have many contract roles available. I am based in Leeds so won't be able to meet in London I am afraid. If something comes up I will message you.
My email is harryn@montash.com
Thanks, Harry
Muhammet Atalay sent the following message at 11:00 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 11:00 AM Perfect I will send my cv today for sure..,
Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 11:01 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 11:01 AM Great, thanks
JUL 3 Muhammet Atalay sent the following message at 9:19 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 9:19 AM Hello, hopes, this message finds you well.
I have come accross contract base Dynamics CRM position that you published in totaljobs.
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Developer (87019308) - https://www.totaljobs.com/job/dynamics-365-developer/montash-job87019308
if the position is still open, would you like to consider my CV that i sent before?
we can arrange a video conference, phıne call or even face2face meeting :) to discuss the position.
regards,
Muhammet ATALAY
JUL 8 Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 8:30 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 8:30 AM Hi Muhammet,
This role has unfortunately been filled. However we can arrange a phone call to discuss your skills and experience, so going forward I can match roles you more closely.
Regards, Harry
Muhammet Atalay sent the following message at 8:35 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 8:35 AM Hello Harry,
thanks for your message,
when shall we arrange a call ? by the way, I am now in Istanbul for 2 weeks (vacation :) ) so there are 2 hours time differences between us.
regards, Muhammet
Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 8:36 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 8:36 AM Okay Muhammet. We can book in a call upon your arrival home in 2 weeks if better for you?
Muhammet Atalay sent the following message at 8:39 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 8:39 AM ok. sounds good. I will inform you once i am back. Is your mobile number valid : 07790862359 ?
Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 8:40 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 8:40 AM Yes my number is correct.
Muhammet Atalay sent the following messages at 8:40 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 8:40 AM Okay, great
Thank you
TODAY View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 6:13 AM Hello Harry from London :)
Hopes, this message finds you well.
My i call you today at 10 am or would you like to suggest a timeslot based on your availability.
thanks a lot.
regards,
Muhammet ATALAY
Harry Nicholson sent the following message at 8:19 AM View Harry’s profile Harry Nicholson Harry Nicholson 8:19 AM Morning Muhammet,
That is fine. Call the office on 0113 4830281 and if I can't answer then one of my colleagues either Jack or James will be best suited to have a phone call with you.
Kind Regards,
Harry
Muhammet Atalay sent the following messages at 9:58 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 9:58 AM Thanks, Harry
View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 10:03 AM I have just called you but you were at another call James was already in a call jack was not available:)
I left a message to you
View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 10:05 AM This is my phone . +44 (0) 772 16 08 414
View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 10:12 AM Regards
